name: Bidspeed
tag_list: government-opportunity-management, federal-opportunities, fedbizopps, find-government-deals, bids, government-contracting
overview:
Bidspeed is a web-based government opportunity management system directly integrated with FedBizOpps.

Bidspeed is specifically designed to help small and medium-sized companies find, manage, and win government contracts.

Find - rich, easy, intuitive filtering designed specifically around FedBizOpps data.

Manage - Bidspeed helps you track due dates, store related documents securely, share information with your team, collaborate on bids, keep connected with contracting officers and team members.

Win - Bidspeed is your homebase for everything that’s important to winning government opportunities. It puts together all those little details so you don’t have to.

Search for opportunities listed on FBO.GOV All from within Bidspeed. Like the opportunity, one click to add it to your watchlist.

Set priorities - Bidspeed lets you prioritize your valuable time so you can concentrate on making money.

Assign the project owner - set one of your co-workers as the project owner and keep everyone in the loop.

Establish an internal due date - Bidspeed automatically reminds everyone on your team when the date is coming due.

Attach all important documents - Statements of Work, Specs, Notes, Proposals. Bidspeed manages your documents simply and securely.

Centralize Feedback - Get your team involved. Share thoughts and documents. Establish ownership. Win the deal.
